turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Theodore K. Lawless.
turn.1: What was Theodore K. Lawless' professional career?
turn.2: His professional memberships included the American Medical Association, the National Medical Association, and the American Association for the Advancement of Science, and in 1935 he became a diplomate of the American Board of Dermatology and Syphilology.
turn.3: What other careers did he have?
turn.4: He served as an associate examiner in Dermatology for the National Board of Medical Examiners and as a consultant for the United States Chemical Warfare Board.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: A shrewd investor and businessman, he became a multi-millionaire, and had a remarkable business career.
turn.7: What types of businesses did he manage?
turn.8: Lawless was director of both the Supreme Life Insurance Company and Marina City Bank.
turn.9: Did he manage any other businesses?
turn.10: He was also a charter member, associate founder, and President of Service Federal Savings and Loan Association in Chicago.
turn.12: Most of his philanthropy involved starting a number of dermatology programs in Israel.
